long_desc.thetext:
26.3.1.1 %Loader% (options = { }) - step 3: Add space between "a" and "[[LoaderRecord]]" - step 9.c.i: "isCallable" -> "IsCallable" - step 10: "rentretly" -> "reentrantly" - step 10: "realmObject" -> "loader"
26.3.2.1 %Loader%.prototype - 1st paragraph: Missing closing parenthesis
26.3.3.3 Loader.prototype.delete ( name ) - preamble: "remove" -> "removes"
26.3.3.5 Loader.prototype.eval ( source ) - step 4: Remove space character in "[[ Realm]]"
26.3.3.6 Loader.prototype.get ( name ) - step 6: Remove space character in "[[ Modules]]"
26.3.3.7 get Loader.prototype.global - step 4: Remove space character in "[[ Realm]]"
26.3.3.8 Loader.prototype.has ( name ) - step 6: Remove space character in "[[ Modules]]"
26.3.3.11 Loader.prototype.load ( name, options = undefined ) - 4th paragraph: "[...] import method is 1" -> "[...] load method is 1"
26.3.3.12 Loader.prototype.module ( source, options ) - preamble: "evaluates evaluates" -> "evaluates" - 3rd paragraph: incomplete sentence "If the optional argument [...]"
26.3.3.15 Loader.prototype.set ( name, module ) - step 7: Remove space character in "[[ Modules]]" - step 8: Remove space character in "[[ key]]" - step 10: Remove space character in "[[ Modules]]"
26.3.3.18 Loader Pipeline Hook Properties - preamble: "provide default" -> "provides default"
26.3.3.18.1 Loader.prototype.normalize - heading: "iLoader" -> "Loader" - 4th paragraph: "initialtes" -> "initiates"
26.3.3.18.2 Loader.prototype.locate - 3rd paragraph: "retrive" -> "retrieve"
